price: 75. Allah heeft boodschappers van de engelen en de mensen gekozen. Waarlijk, Allah is Alhorend, Alziend.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaṣṭafī mina al-malāikati rusulan wamina al-nāsi inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
